title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Beat eggs and mix with grated cheese.
Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste.
Add cream and simmer with chicken.
